item.title: This blog has been gathering dust
item.description: Hoo-boy! It has been a long time since last wrote in this blog and… well… a lot has happened1 since then. VISA APPLICATION SUCCESSFUL!!!! @Jimmmin AND I ARE MOVING TO LONDON NEXT WEEK!ðŸŽ‰ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ðŸŽ‰ pic.twitter.com/EnONwDkiB4 — Doctorb Zhian N. Kamvar (@ZKamvar) June 15, 2018 I promise that from now on, I will update this blog at least once a week with thoughts or insights I have about R package development, research software engineering, and updates to R packages.
